Changelog
=========

0.1.5 (2010-09-08)
------------------

 - Adaptend build to Plone4 and released source [davidjonas]

0.1.4 (2009-11-30)
------------------

 - Added "Person's last name" to collections criteria.
 
0.1.3 (2009-05-13)
------------------

 - Allow the view to be overwritten by the theme views.

0.1.1 (2009-05-12)
------------------

 - Added a field for an email address with spam protection.
 
0.1 (xxxx-xx-xx)
----------------

 - Created recipe with ZopeSkel [Rui Guerra].
